boat.construction_details: Pitchpine on Canadian Rock Elm, Teak superstructure
boat.full_description:
Faoilean Ban was built in Rowhedge, Essex in 1962. She is a 10 ton 32ft bermudan sloop, well-built for cruising and off-shore racing. Full details of her design and dimensions may be found in Yachting World, July 1962 p.328. Built as Curtsy, her name was changed to Faoilean Ban in 2009 and her present condition (2024) is described as excellent..

Built for J F Kentish, a Partner and Director of Danforth Jackson Ltd from 1961 to 1970, an honorary measurer of the SCOD Association and noted motorcyclist.  

Build was written up in Yachting World in July 1962.
boat.name: Faoilean Ban
boat.short_description: Faoilean Ban is built for cruising and off-shore racing.
